name: mattermost
description: Mattermost is an open-source collaboration and messaging platform for teams. It offers chat, file sharing, integrations, and compliance tooling with enterprise features that can be deployed self-hosted or as SaaS.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Organize conversations in channels for teams, projects, or topics with threaded replies

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Upload and share documents, images, and files with inline previews and search

features.title: Video Calls
features.description: Start voice and video calls directly from channels or direct messages

features.title: Custom Slash Commands
features.description: Create shortcuts for common actions or integrate with external services

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access Mattermost on iOS and Android with full feature parity to desktop

features.title: Search Functionality
features.description: Find messages, files, and conversations using powerful search with filters
